    • IslandGroup

      @Deprecated public IslandGroup(int idGroup, List<Island> islands, IslandGroup nextIslandGroup, IslandGroup prevIslandGroup, List<StudentEnum> students, TeamEnum towerColor, ParameterHandler parameters)
      Deprecated.

    • IslandGroup

      public IslandGroup(int idGroup, List<Island> islands, IslandGroup nextIslandGroup, IslandGroup prevIslandGroup, List<StudentEnum> students, TeamEnum towerColor, ParameterHandler parameters, VirtualView virtualView)
      version with pattern observer
      Parameters:
      idGroup - the id this island group should have
      islands - the list of islands this groups is made of
      nextIslandGroup - the next island group on the board
      prevIslandGroup - the previous island group on the board
      students - the stuednts this group contains
      towerColor - the color of the tower that this group has on top
      parameters - the parameters of the game
      virtualView - the view that will get updated upon model changes

    • IslandGroup

      public IslandGroup(IslandGroup island)
      Creates a copy of the island parameter
      Parameters:
      island - the IslandGroup to create a new object out of

  • Method Details

    • getIslandGroup

      public static IslandGroup getIslandGroup(int idGroup, List<Island> islands, IslandGroup nextIslandGroup, IslandGroup prevIslandGroup, List<StudentEnum> students, TeamEnum towerColor, ParameterHandler parameters)

    • getCollectionOfIslandGroup

      public static List<IslandGroup> getCollectionOfIslandGroup(ParameterHandler parameters, int startingId, int amount)
      Creates a collection of island groups with no useful data inside except for the linkage between these island groups
      Parameters:
      startingId - Starting id for the IslandGroups
      amount - Amount of IslandGroups to have in the collection. if the amount is 1, the next and previous pointers will refer to the single island group in the collection
      Returns:
      A collection of island groups, ordered cyclically

    • getCollectionOfIslandGroup

      public static List<IslandGroup> getCollectionOfIslandGroup(ParameterHandler parameters, int startingId, int amount, VirtualView virtualView)

    • evaluateMostInfluential

      public TeamEnum evaluateMostInfluential()
      Evaluates which team has the most influence If two or more teams have the same influence, returns TeamEnum.NOTEAM
      Returns:
      the Team with the most influence on this IslandGroup

    • build

      public void build(TeamEnum team, List<Player> players)
      Builds the towers according to the evaluation of the most influential Team If the most influential team is NOTEAM or if it's the same team as the previous one, it does nothing.
      Parameters:
      team - the team who will build their towers
      players - a copy of the collection of players in SimpleGame

    • mergeAdjacent

      public IslandGroup mergeAdjacent(int newId, List<IslandGroup> islandGroups) throws UnmergeableException
      Merges this islandGroup with the neighboring islands and updates the IslandGroup collection in game
      Parameters:
      newId - the id to assign the newly formed group
      islandGroups - the islandGroup list that the new island will need to check for possible mergings
      Returns:
      the new islandGroup created by the merging
      Throws:
      UnmergeableException - The island group can't be merged with any neighbors

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(StudentEnum student)
      adds a student on this island
      Parameters:
      student - the student to add onto the island

    • numOfIslandsInGroup

      public int numOfIslandsInGroup()
      Returns the amount of islands in this IslandGroup

    • numberOfStudentsOfColor

      private int numberOfStudentsOfColor(StudentEnum color)
      returns the amount of students of a given color on this IslandGroup
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to count
      Returns:
      the amount of students of type color

    • toBean

      public GameElementBean toBean()
      Specified by:
      toBean in class DrawableObject
      Returns:
      a Java Bean with all information about this Island group, its id, islands' ids, students on this island group, if MN is present, tower color
